languages.text: {n}Абеляр чинно принимает кубок, делает полглотка и задумчиво хмыкает:{/n} "Интересный букет. Не слишком изысканный, но достойный — на мой неискушенный взгляд".
{n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр чинно принимает кубок, делает полглотка и задумчиво хмыкает:{/n} "Интересный букет. Не слишком изысканный, но достойный — на мой неискушенный взгляд".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup decorously, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined but quite decent, in my uninitiated opinion."
{n}Abelard accepts the cup decorously, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined but quite decent, in my uninitiated opinion."

{n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德彬彬有礼地接过酒杯，喝了半口，之后若有所思地哼了一声。{/n}“很有趣的佳酿。以我的拙见，虽然这酒算不上难得的佳酿，但依然是很适宜的饮品。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德彬彬有礼地接过酒杯，喝了半口，之后若有所思地哼了一声。{/n}“很有趣的佳酿。以我的拙见，虽然这酒算不上难得的佳酿，但依然是很适宜的饮品。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは礼儀正しく杯を受け取り、半分ほどを口に含むと、考え込むようにうなり声を漏らした。{/n}「興味深い香りですね。とくに洗練されているわけではありませんが、私のような素人の感想としては、十分に飲める代物です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは礼儀正しく杯を受け取り、半分ほどを口に含むと、考え込むようにうなり声を漏らした。{/n}「興味深い香りですね。とくに洗練されているわけではありませんが、私のような素人の感想としては、十分に飲める代物です」

languages.text: {n}Abelard acepta la copa con sumo decoro, se bebe la mitad de un trago y gruñe con aire pensativo:{/n} «Un buqué interesante. No muy refinado, pero bastante potable, en mi humilde opinión de lego».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard acepta la copa con sumo decoro, se bebe la mitad de un trago y gruñe con aire pensativo:{/n} «Un buqué interesante. No muy refinado, pero bastante potable, en mi humilde opinión de lego».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, büyük bir görgüyle kadehi kabul ediyor ve yarım yudum alıp düşünceli bir şekilde homurdanıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir karışım. Pek rafine değil ama benim tecrübesiz görüşüme göre oldukça içilebilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, büyük bir görgüyle kadehi kabul ediyor ve yarım yudum alıp düşünceli bir şekilde homurdanıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir karışım. Pek rafine değil ama benim tecrübesiz görüşüme göre oldukça içilebilir."

languages.text: {n}Abélard accepte la coupe avec grande pompe, avale une demi-gorgée et grogne pensivement :{/n} « Un bouquet intéressant. Pas particulièrement raffiné, mais très buvable pour le non initié que je suis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard accepte la coupe avec grande pompe, avale une demi-gorgée et grogne pensivement :{/n} « Un bouquet intéressant. Pas particulièrement raffiné, mais très buvable pour le non initié que je suis. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard nimmt den Becher umständlich entgegen, leert ihn zur Hälfte und murmelt gedankenverloren:{/n} "Ein interessantes Bouquet. Nicht wirklich ausgearbeitet, aber durchaus trinkbar, wenn Ihr mich fragt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard accepts the cup with great decorum, takes half a gulp, and grunts thoughtfully,{/n} "An interesting bouquet. Not particularly refined, but quite potable, in my uninitiated opinion."
